title: 前端性能优化
situation: Discussing frontend performance. The page load is slow; you're considering lazy loading and caching.

turns.speaker: partner
turns.text: 首屏加载时间超过三秒，LCP和FCP都不达标。
turns.pinyin: Shǒu píng jiāzài shíjiān chāoguò sān miǎo, LCP hé FCP dōu bù dá biāo.
turns.translation: First-screen load is over 3 seconds, LCP and FCP are below target.

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: 可以考虑代码分割和懒加载，把非首屏的chunk拆出去。
turns.pinyin: Kěyǐ kǎolǜ dàimǎ fēngē hé lǎn jiāzài, bǎ fēi shǒu píng de chunk chāi chūqù.
turns.translation: We could do code splitting and lazy loading, split off non-critical chunks.
suggestions: 可以考虑代码分割和懒加载，把非首屏的chunk拆出去。

turns.speaker: partner
turns.text: 接口请求也要优化，很多重复调用。
turns.pinyin: Jiēkǒu qǐngqiú yě yào yōuhuà, hěn duō chóngfù diàoyòng.
turns.translation: API calls need optimization too, lots of duplicate requests.

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: 加一层cache吧，Redis或者内存缓存，设置合理的TTL。
turns.pinyin: Jiā yī céng cache ba, Redis huòzhě nèicún huǎncún, shèzhì hélǐ de TTL.
turns.translation: Add a cache layer, Redis or in-memory, with a reasonable TTL.
suggestions: 加一层cache吧，Redis或者内存缓存，设置合理的TTL。
